verses.text: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* stir him up, \w like|strong="H4758"\w* \w one|strong="H0408"\w* \w that|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* cruel: \w for|strong="H1571"\w* \w who|strong="H4758"\w* \w can|strong="H4758"\w* resist \w my|strong="H1571"\w* countenance?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath given \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* repay \w him|strong="H6440"\w*? All \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w under|strong="H6440"\w* heaven \w are|strong="H4310"\w* mine.

\w I|strong="H8478"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* not spare \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, nor \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mighty words, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* framed \w to|strong="H8064"\w* make supplication.

\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* discover \w the|strong="H1697"\w* face \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* garment? \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* go into \w the|strong="H1697"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* mouth?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* doors \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*? \w his|strong="H0935"\w* teeth \w are|strong="H4310"\w* terrible round \w about|strong="H0935"\w*.
\w His|strong="H6440"\w* body \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* molten shields, shut close up \w with|strong="H6440"\w* scales pressing upon \w one|strong="H5439"\w* another.
One \w is|strong="H1346"\w* joined \w to|strong="H4043"\w* another, \w and|strong="H4043"\w* not so much as any air can come between them:

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* stick \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* hold \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* fast, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* separated.

\w His|strong="H0376"\w* sneezing \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* shining \w of|strong="H0376"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* eyes \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* eyelids \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* morning.
Out \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5869"\w* mouth go forth lamps, \w like|strong="H5869"\w* torches \w of|strong="H5869"\w* lighted fire.

\w Out|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H4422"\w* nostrils goeth smoke, \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H1980"\w* pot heated \w and|strong="H1980"\w* boiling.

\w His|strong="H3318"\w* breath kindleth coals, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* flame cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1731"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* mouth.

\w In|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* neck \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* dwell, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w want|strong="H5315"\w* goeth before \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w face|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* members \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* flesh cleave one \w to|strong="H6440"\w* another: \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* send lightnings \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* not be carried \w to|strong="H6440"\w* another place.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H4131"\w* as \w hard|strong="H3332"\w* as \w a|strong="H5921"\w* stone, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* as \w firm|strong="H3332"\w* as \w a|strong="H5921"\w* smithâ€™s anvil.

\w When|strong="H3644"\w* \w he|strong="H0068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* raise \w him|strong="H3644"\w* up, \w the|strong="H3332"\w* angels \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* being affrighted \w shall|strong="H0068"\w* purify themselves.

When \w a|strong="H2398"\w* sword \w shall|strong="H2398"\w* lay at \w him|strong="H2398"\w*, it \w shall|strong="H2398"\w* not be able \w to|strong="H0410"\w* hold, nor \w a|strong="H2398"\w* spear, nor \w a|strong="H2398"\w* breastplate.
\w For|strong="H5381"\w* \w he|strong="H2719"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* esteem iron \w as|strong="H6965"\w* straw, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* brass \w as|strong="H6965"\w* rotten wood.

\w The|strong="H2803"\w* archer shall not put \w him|strong="H2803"\w* \w to|strong="H2803"\w* flight, \w the|strong="H2803"\w* stones \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H2803"\w* sling \w are|strong="H1270"\w* \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H2803"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* stubble.

\w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* esteem \w the|strong="H3808"\w* hammer, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* laugh \w him|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* scorn \w who|strong="H1121"\w* shaketh \w the|strong="H3808"\w* spear.

\w The|strong="H2803"\w* beams \w of|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H2803"\w* sun shall be under \w him|strong="H2803"\w*, \w and|strong="H7494"\w* \w he|strong="H2803"\w* shall strew gold under \w him|strong="H2803"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* mire.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w make|strong="H7502"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* deep sea \w to|strong="H5921"\w* boil \w like|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* pot, \w and|strong="H8478"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w make|strong="H7502"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* ointments boil.
\w A|strong="H7760"\w* path shall shine after \w him|strong="H7760"\w*, \w he|strong="H7760"\w* shall esteem \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w deep|strong="H4688"\w* \w as|strong="H7760"\w* growing old.
There \w is|strong="H8415"\w* no power upon earth \w that|strong="H0310"\w* can be compared \w with|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w* who was made \w to|strong="H2803"\w* fear no one.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* beholdeth every high thing, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* pride.
